snippet: MELTZER--Alice Ruby, 69, of North Miami Beach, Florida, passed away July 10, 2016 after a 17 year battle with breast cancer. Born and raised in Brooklyn, New York, she was the daughter of the late Dr. Nathan Ruby and Helen Ruby (Handler). 1/3...
lead_paragraph: MELTZER--Alice Ruby, 69, of North Miami Beach, Florida, passed away July 10, 2016 after a 17 year battle with breast cancer. Born and raised in Brooklyn, New York, she was the daughter of the late Dr. Nathan Ruby and Helen Ruby (Handler). 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MELTZER, ALICE RUBY
